channel.title: Server asking for interface client doesn't have
channel.description:
hello i run a server(base: project fatality) in which it's client sucks so I'm switching to hybrid pvp client but the problem with the client is that where i click on the skills tab the client freezes and gives me this error: [code=java]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:9454) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2752) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9325) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10165) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5752) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
i think i know what's the problem as the nice people below me pointed out that the client doesn't have some interfaces the server wants so my question is how do i add interfaces :D

item.title: Server asking for interface client doesn't have
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

imsuperman05:

The skill tab isn’t implemented properly, or has an anti-leech. You would have to find another client that has a working skill tab, and just rip it.

how do i do that

Read full topic
item.source: Server asking for interface client doesn't have
